summary: Completed comprehensive testing of French Wii U guide SD Preparation modifications. Successfully verified removal of individual download buttons, implementation of single pack download functionality with dynamic tags, and all required features working perfectly.
passed_tests: CRITICAL: Individual download buttons (download-payloads-btn, download-aroma-btn) are completely REMOVED
CRITICAL: Single 'Télécharger le pack complet' button exists with data-testid='download-pack-btn'
CRITICAL: Download pack button correctly links to https://aroma.foryour.cafe/ with target='_blank'
CRITICAL: Pack section displays 'Votre pack personnalisé' with accurate component count
CRITICAL: All 5 default components show as emerald-styled tags (EnvironmentLoader, Nanddumper, Base-Aroma, Bloopair, FTPiiU Plugin)
CRITICAL: Dynamic tag updates work perfectly when toggling plugins (tested with Inkay, Screenshot Plugin, SDCafiine Plugin)
CRITICAL: Component count updates dynamically (from 5 to 7 components when toggling additional plugins)
Installation step 1 correctly references 'Télécharger le pack complet' instead of individual downloads
All 3 installation steps (Télécharger le pack, Insérer carte SD, Extraire) are present and working
Config cards are clickable and toggle plugin selection properly
Pack download section (data-testid='pack-download-section') displays with proper styling and structure
FAT32 warning section and Mac tip collapsible section work correctly
Navigation Précédent button links correctly to /guide/wiiu/outils
All 4 main sections present: Base (Payloads), Aroma, Plugins additionnels, Installation sur la carte SD
Page loads correctly at /guide/wiiu/preparation with step-preparation testid
French language implementation throughout all sections
Glassmorphism design and emerald color scheme maintained

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (16/16 critical requirements met, all functionality working perfectly)
